Reviews.Title: 2nd Zeki tablet
Reviews.Author: cw6ft2ntx "cw"
Reviews.Content: Great price/value. Works great, as expected. Wore out/broke my previous Zeki's power cord pin connector. Probably similar in lots of electronics with single pin connection. I plugged in & unplugged often and after 3 months with daily plugging, it just would no longer charge. I will never unplug this one. Shipping was great, would recommend. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Fits my needs
Reviews.Author: James W. Yancey
Reviews.Content: Its easy to use,very bright.The tablet loads quickly A thin but not too difficult to handle.The screen has a most detailed display.
